parameters: This door leads to the kitchen, and from there to the rest of the mansion. A distinct smell of garlic wafts underneath the door. You had better find another way in.
This is the residence hall. The party is being held in the main hall, south of the kitchen.
Miss! I am glad you're up.
I had prepared the special sun block you asked for, but I lost it while I was cleaning. I am sure I left it in one of these rooms...
You found it! Sorry, I can be such a klutz sometimes...
Good luck on finding the sunblock!
Maybe I'd stop asking him to leave if he wasn't getting in the way of my cleaning!
You apply a heavy dose of the sunblock.
This door leads out of the building. The bright, peircing sun is no doubt pounding down onto the concrete. You know you would burn up if you stepped outside.
Are you lost? I'm not lost. I'm just taking a short break.
The maid told me to leave, but honestly, I think she likes me.
There's nothing back here. Get back to the party before you blow our cover.
This door leads to the kitchen, and from there to the rest of the mansion. A distinct smell of garlic wafts underneath the door. You had better find another way in.
You apply a heavy dose of the sunblock.
This door leads out of the building. The bright, peircing sun is no doubt pounding down onto the concrete. You know you would burn up if you stepped outside.
